```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(elevatr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)
library(raster)
```



```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
bb = read_csv("/Users/xingxin/Github/geog176a-summer-2020-lab1/uscities.csv") %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c("lng", "lat"), crs = 4326) %>% 
  filter(city == "Goleta") %>% 
  st_transform(5070) %>% 
  st_buffer(5000)
  st_bbox(bb) %>% 
  st_as_sfc() %>% 
  st_as_sf()

elev = get_elev_raster(bb, z = 11) %>% 
  crop(bb)

plot(elev)

elevtif = elev 
elevtif[elevtif <= 0] = NA
plot(elevtif)
  
writeRaster(elevtif, filename = "/Users/xingxin/Github/geog176a-summer-2020-lab1/goletaelev.tif", overwrite = TRUE)

```

r = raster("data/goleta-elev.tif")
